ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] EverQuest Networking Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Directplay?!? I just know it uses TCP and UDP connections hehe, the patch server is a regular HTTP server on port 7000... Haven t checked what is uses in upper
ygData.messageBody:
Directplay?!? I just know it uses TCP and UDP connections hehe, the patch
server is a regular HTTP server on port 7000... Haven't checked what is uses
in upper levels though...

- Avron -


-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: sentto-60837-866-960745639-avron=alliances.org@...
[mailto:sentto-60837-866-960745639-avron=alliances.org@....c
om]För Michael Rhodes
Skickat: den 11 juni 2000 19:56
Till: EverQuest@egroups.com
Ämne: [EverQuest] EverQuest Networking Question


Hello everyone...

I'm not sure if many people would know this for sure, but I am wondering
what everquest uses for internet communication. Is it using directplay, or
just Winsock API calls?

I'm wondering this because I am interested in learning networking
programming for games, and am just curious as to what other games are
using.....


Thanks,
Michael Rhodes
